title: A letter about liberty and necessity written to the Duke of Newcastle / by Thomas Hobbes. With observations upon it by a learned Prelate of the Church of England lately deceased.
author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
publisher: Printed by J. Grover for W. Crooke,
notes: "Observations upon a letter of Mr. T. Hobbs to the Duke of Newcastle" (p. 23-104)
Reproduction of original in the Trinty College Library, Cambridge University.
